homepage.bio: I'm a software engineer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I'm focused on building accessible, human-centered products at XYZ company. Prior to XYZ, I worked at ABC, where I learned the ins and outs of the industry. During that time, I also got to implement a lot of neat projects.
